title: SI's Wertheim Recalls 'Glory Days' of 1984 in New Book
itunes:title: SI's Wertheim Recalls 'Glory Days' of 1984 in New Book
description:
Jon Wertheim, Senior Writer for Sports Illustrated, discusses his new book "Glory Days: The Summer of 1984 and the 90 Days That Changed Sports and Culture Forever.”

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
